<!-- metadata:{"confidence":10,"steps":[]} -->
Hard-coding real MongoDB credentials in a committed Kubernetes Secret exposes sensitive data and allows anyone with repo access to connect to the database.

```suggestion
  MONGODB_URI: "<REPLACE_WITH_ENV_SECRET>"
```

